subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltrán's walk-off home run capped a busy day for the Mets, who made a trade for outfielder Shawn Green and received good news concerning Tom Glavine.
snippet: Carlos Beltrán's walk-off home run capped a busy day for the Mets, who made a trade for outfielder Shawn Green and received good news concerning Tom Glavine.
